quoteText:
You are allowed to use a
pseudonym if you so choose

case: You agree not to submit illegal content
quoteText:
If we find objectionable content, it will be removed.
Examples of such content: pornography, hate speech, pro-abortion or pro-gay
“marriage” propaganda, illegal or illicit activities, and questionable drug use

case: Third parties are not allowed to access your personal information without a legal basis
quoteText:
Sometimes we do take a peek to make sure everything goes smoothly for all our
users, but we never tell anyone what we find (unless we find something very
illegal

case: The terms for this service are easy to read
The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
You can retrieve an archive of your data
This service provides a way for you to export your data
This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users
quoteText:
We are not responsible in any way for the activities of
users on our online services

case: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
quoteText:
If you are misusing, abusing,
or putting a large amount of strain on our systems, we will ask you to stop
or to pay a small usage fee.
If you disregard our requests, we reserve the
right to terminate your account or otherwise block your access

case: No guarantee is given regarding quality
quoteText: We are not liable if bad stuff happens, even if it’s our software’s fault

case: No third-party analytics or tracking platforms are used
quoteText:
Analytical
data does not move outside Netsyms servers, and you cannot be identified with
it

case: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
quoteText:
If you wish to have
your personal information removed from our systems, you want a copy of your
data, or you want to change your information but can’t find a way to do so,
contact us and we will be happy to assist you

case: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
quoteText: We will attempt to notify you via email of any major changes to this document.

case: Only necessary logs are kept by the service to ensure quality
quoteText:
We only retain data as needed to provide you with
services

case: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time
quoteText:
We only retain data as needed to provide you with
services.
We never log historical location data.
any such data we receive
overwrites the older data.
Under normal conditions, we keep server access logs
no longer than one month
